jd: From: Akshit, Stellentit akshit@stellentit.com Reply to: akshit@stellentit.com Hi Hope you are doing well Title: Project Manager Scrum MasterLocation: Richmond, VA (Hybrid – Need Only Locals within 50 miles with Photo ID)Duration: 6+ months contract and then full-time hire Job Description:-Scrum Master Certification (CSM) - Required PMP certification OR PM certification - Required Thanks & RegardsAkshit Sisonia - Sr. Technical RecruiterEmail- akshit@stellentit.com STELLENT IT – A Nationally Recognized Minority Certified Enterprise"Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light." - JK Rowling
